<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a PIX payment status.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/pix/payments/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Get a PIX payment status.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Payment UUID.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"x-wallet-uuid","in":"header","description":"Sender Wallet UUID (if empty, your default Wallet UUID will be settled)","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Payment received.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Payment UUID.","example":"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"operation_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Operation UUID. Used to get receipt and track the transaction. This will not be returned if the payment has been scheduled.","example":"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"state"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`PENDING`, `WAITING`, `CONFIRMED`, `ERROR`, `FAILED`, `CANCELED`, `SCHEDULED`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["PENDING","WAITING","CONFIRMED","ERROR","FAILED","CANCELED","SCHEDULED"],"description":"Payment state.","example":"PENDING"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"value"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Value in R$ cents.","example":1299}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"payment_date"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"format":"date-time","type":"string","description":"Schedule a day to execute payment. Use null to send payment right now.","example":null,"nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"User defined payment description.","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"failed_message"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Error returned when payment is reverted.","example":"Não foi possível processar o seu pedido. Por favor tente novamente.","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"created_at"} required={true} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"format":"date-time","type":"string","description":"Payment created date.","example":"2024-04-24T13:52:51.133Z"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa\",\n  \"operation_id\": \"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa\",\n  \"state\": \"PENDING\",\n  \"value\": 1299,\n  \"payment_date\": null,\n  \"description\": \"string\",\n  \"failed_message\": \"Não foi possível processar o seu pedido. Por favor tente novamente.\",\n  \"created_at\": \"2024-04-24T13:52:51.133Z\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>
